p: One of the compounds identified from the norlignan class is (1S,2R)-O-Methylnyasicoside ( m/z 493.167, ion mode [M + H] +). This compound is fragmented into m/z 475.159 and becomes 313.117 [M + H-C 6H 12O 5] + with the loss of C 6H 12O 5 molecules ( Figure S3F). The heatmap model ( Figure S4A,B) depicts the variation of compounds found in the ion [M + H] + and [M – H] −, which corresponds to its intensity from each plant part of both Curculigo species.
